alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 3:46AM PST until January 01 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THIS MORNING... * CHANGES...Extended the warning through 7 AM. * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulation of up to 2 inches. * WHERE...Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...A significant amount of snow has fallen through the region and roads remain icy and snow covered. Allow plenty of extra time for travel this morning and check with NDOT (nvroads.com) for the latest on road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake enhanced snow bands have formed off Pyramid Lake, impacting areas south and southwest of the lake. This may lead to localized higher snow totals in these areas.
info.instruction: Avoid travel if possible, you could be stuck in your vehicle for many hours. If you must travel, prepare for long delays and carry an emergency kit with extra food, water and clothing. If you stay home, have a backup plan in case of power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
